Mod.Name: Skin-RF
Mod.Author: Dulca + Slimebucket
Mod.Description:
New vesion 1.61 out now! HD Weapons are all done! Selphie, Laguna and Irvine Added. Ward accidently had Kiro's weapon textures. This has been fixed. Zell's Maverick Alternate weapon has been changed.
Skin-RF -Enhance field models. Multiple Battle models to choose from for Playable characters with synchronized Field models. - Includes Slimebucket Weapon Pack

LatestVersion.ReleaseNotes: Version 1.61 : Ward weapon fixed, Zells Maverick Alternate weapon changed. Version 1.60 : Selphie Laguna Irvine Weapons added- WEAPONS COMPLETE Version 1.50 : More weapons added - Quistis and Rinoa Version 1.40 : More weapons added - Kiros, Ward, Seifer and Zell Version 1.31 : Cloudie McDoom Squall Costume added, minor fixes Version 1.21 : Minor bug fixes Version 1.20 : Slimebucket Weapon Pack for Squall added. Version 1.10 : Playable characters have a low poly synced field model. New Field models for All Playable characters. Synchrized world map model for Squall.
